TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICoalesceAssignmentOperation implements class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.IOperation, class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Operations.IAssignmentOperation
type ICoalesceAssignmentOperation = interface interface IAssignmentOperation interface IOperation

Docs.summary:
Represents a coalesce assignment operation with a target and a conditionally-evaluated value: (1) is evaluated for null. If it is null, is evaluated and assigned to target. (2) is conditionally evaluated if is null, and the result is assigned into . The result of the entire expression is , which is only evaluated once.
Current Usage: (1) C# null-coalescing assignment operation Target ??= Value.
Docs.remarks: This interface is reserved for implementation by its associated APIs. We reserve the right to change it in the future.
